name: CPAlertAction
desc: An object that encapsulates an action the user can perform on an action sheet or alert.

items.desc: Creates an alert action with a title, style, and action handler.

items.name: var style: CPAlertAction.Style
items.desc: The display style for the action button.

items.name: var handler: CPAlertActionHandler
items.desc: The closure that CarPlay invokes after the user taps the action button.

items.desc: The declaration for an alert action handler.
